Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1969...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 2/13/1969 (Going to CHC: P A. Hrabosky. Going to NYM: RF B. Gallagher)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Minnesota on 1/31/1970 (Going to CHC: P B. Cueto. Going to MIN: SS W. Garrett, P A. Hrabosky, P C. Acosta)...
Traded from Minnesota to Philadelphia on 1/31/1972 (Going to PHI: P C. Nieson, CF J. Hicks, P A. Hrabosky. Going to MIN: P J. Franklin, P J. Dukes)...
Injured on 5/21/1972 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/9/1972...
Had first career hit on 7/25/1972, off John Buzhardt (CHC)...
